p: Our reconstruction of the spread of the three distinct epidemic clades is in agreement with the current literature ( Figure 2). The Asian Urban lineage has spread from Southeastern Asia to the Pacific Islands and Central America, with traveler cases reaching the Continental United States (AUL-Am clade) [ 7, 60]. A strain from Eastern Africa spread to India and is currently endemic in South and Southeast Asia (ECSA-IOL clade) [ 61]. More recently, a lineage from Middle Africa was introduced in South America (ECSA-MASA clade) [ 62, 63].
